SELECT CLS_CD , REQ_DEPT_CD , FIN_CD , REQ_DT , SAVE_FILE_NM , UPL_FILE_NM , (SELECT FINANCE_NAME FROM RR_FINANCE WHERE FINANCE_CD=T.FIN_CD) AS FIN_NM , MAX(TRNS_STTS) AS TRNS_STTS , MAX(TRNS_STTS_NM) || '(' || SUM(STTS_CNT) || '/' || COUNT(*) || ')' AS TRNS_STTS_NM FROM ( SELECT A.CLS_CD , A.REQ_DEPT_CD , A.FIN_CD , A.REQ_DT , A.SAVE_FILE_NM , A.UPL_FILE_NM , A.TRNS_STTS , (SELECT CD_NM FROM TM_CD_INF WHERE GRP_CD='AnlySt' AND CD=A.TRNS_STTS) AS TRNS_STTS_NM , DECODE(B.TRNS_STTS, 0, 1, 1, 1, 0) AS STTS_CNT , A.REG_DT FROM TM_FLUPL_INF A, TM_RCDFL_INF B WHERE A.CLS_CD=B.CLS_CD AND A.REQ_DEPT_CD=B.REQ_DEPT_CD AND A.FIN_CD=B.FIN_CD AND A.SAVE_FILE_NM=B.SAVE_FILE_NM AND A.UPL_SPR='1'
AND B.USE_YN='X'
AND B.USE_YN='Y' AND
( A.CLS_CD=#{fList.cls_cd} AND A.REQ_DEPT_CD=#{fList.req_dept_cd} AND A.FIN_CD=#{fList.fin_cd} AND A.SAVE_FILE_NM=#{fList.save_file_nm} )
) T GROUP BY CLS_CD, REQ_DEPT_CD, FIN_CD, REQ_DT, SAVE_FILE_NM, UPL_FILE_NM ORDER BY MAX(REG_DT) ASC
